text: Gaiusɨ 16.23-24 HJL 19.29, 1 Ko 1.14, 2 Ti 4.20 avi nalusaŋ lamuli uami. Viaŋ nudɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ hɨnidalɨŋ nɨbu iadɨ sɨhɨvia sɨbaŋ migɨlɨlalɨ uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahavɨmi agɨlaŋ nudɨ ulaŋ hɨvɨ mɨgudɨbavɨlalɨ uami. Lɨdɨŋ Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahaiaha saŋ sɨhɨ iahavɨlalɨ uami. Elasɨtusɨ nɨbu haiabɨla neŋ hɨsɨŋ huban agɨladɨ anɨm hɨlɨcɨ agɨladɨ migɨlɨlalɨ uami. Nɨbu aludɨ ima me Kualɨtusɨ hula ahica nalusaŋ lamulavi uami.
